description: Default service descriptions for maid service tenants (informational only, no pricing)

services.title: Standard Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Regular maintenance cleaning for your home
services.description: Our standard cleaning service covers all the essential areas of your home with thorough attention to detail. Perfect for regular maintenance to keep your home consistently clean and fresh.

services.title: Deep Cleaning
services.description: Our deep cleaning service goes beyond standard maintenance to address areas that need extra attention. Ideal for spring cleaning, move-in preparation, or when your home needs a thorough refresh.

services.title: Move In/Out Cleaning
services.description: Specialized cleaning service for move-in or move-out situations. We ensure the property is spotless and ready for new occupants, covering areas that are typically inaccessible during regular cleaning.

services.title: Recurring Cleaning Service
services.description: Consistent, reliable cleaning on your schedule. Choose weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly service to maintain a consistently clean home without the hassle of scheduling each visit.

services.title: Post-Event Cleaning
services.description: Quick turnaround cleaning after parties, gatherings, or special events. We handle the cleanup so you can enjoy your event and relax afterward.
